private_memories.name: QA Strategy Planning
private_memories.episode_body: Focus on expanding E2E test coverage and improving test automation frameworks. Luis is doing well on test automation. Need to hire senior QA engineer for test architecture.

public_memories.name: Kate Thompson - QA Lead
public_memories.episode_body: Kate Thompson is QA Lead at TechFlow Solutions, leading the QA Team. Expert in test automation, quality assurance processes, and end-to-end testing strategies. 7 years QA experience. Manages Luis Rodriguez. Ensures quality across all releases.

public_memories.name: Testing Strategy
public_memories.episode_body: Multi-layer testing approach: unit tests (pytest for backend, Vitest for frontend), integration tests (API testing), E2E tests (Playwright). Minimum 80% code coverage required. All PRs must pass tests before merge. E2E tests run on every deployment to staging.

public_memories.name: Checkout Flow Test Plan
public_memories.episode_body: E2E test scenarios for checkout: happy path (complete purchase), payment failure handling, form validation errors, session persistence, mobile responsive behavior, accessibility compliance. Testing across browsers: Chrome, Firefox, Safari. Mobile testing on iOS and Android.
